Articles.Content: Oh nooooo! I learned about him in a class about Darwin and the Galapagos. He was a cool tortoise.

lets have 5 miunits of silence of posting to remember him :\'(

edit:5 mins is over but still remember him!
I had 5 minutes of silence when I heard it at about 8am (10 hours ago).
I guess im the one not feeling as sad because i never heard of him :-[

I guess im the one not feeling as sad because i never heard of him :-[

This statement also sort of goes for me to... It\'s still sad that a rare species died, though. I do wounder how he did die. It might of been something he ate or stuff like that.

goodbye lonsome gorge

What? Did they fill it in?

*Ba-DUM Tish!*

I guess ol\' Lonesome isn\'t lonesome anymore. Probably chillin\' on a beach in Happy Turtleland surrounded by hot turtle babes and sippin a Mai-Tai.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

What? Did they fill it in?

*Ba-DUM Tish!*

I guess ol\' Lonesome isn\'t lonesome anymore. Probably chillin\' on a beach in Happy Turtleland surrounded by hot turtle babes and sippin a Mai-Tai.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

True, on that, true on that.

Guys, think. When we have children they will never have that species in their lifetimes.

Anyway, I thought they would find another tortoise of that species and they would breed, so they would have LITTEL BABBIES.

he died young for his spices

for us 20-30

Guys, think. When we have children they will never have that species in their lifetimes.

Anyway, I thought they would find another tortoise of that species and they would breed, so they would have LITTEL BABBIES.

Yeah, there are probably more of his species hiding somewhere.(Some had to survive after having their habitats eaten by goats.)
